Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory3.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "You've been staring at me long enough. If you have something to say, just spit it out.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Look at you, Mr. Popular!', 3: '7', 4: 'Is this the "unnecessary trouble" you were referring to?', 5: '7'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I ran into the same thing on a previous mission.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'This Inver-Device isn\'t the usual "horn" shape, so people mistake me for a human.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Why not say that you're a Construct?", 3: '11', 4: "Do you think people care if you're a Construct?", 5: '12'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "As I said, Constructs can only leave when we're on a mission. That's why you need an application. I don't want to cause a scene or give us any trouble.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Constructs are combat androids created by humans. Humans have set reasonable "rules," therefore we abide by them. Much like how mathematics adheres to causality.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "If I had time to concern myself with such trivial matters, I'd be better off using this time to upgrade my weapons.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm sure she just made a simple mistake.", 3: '15', 4: 'Are you okay with me being the only human you talk to?', 5: '16'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Do you want to go explain it to her or something?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Compared to stopping the Punishing Virus, this shouldn't cause any problems.", 4: '1'}
{2: '【kuroname】', 3: 'But this feels different from our usual work. Walking around Babylonia in street clothes, fells like...'}
{2: 'A date...', 3: '19', 4: 'A special occasion!', 5: '19'}
{2: '【kuroname】', 3: "I don't know if you've noticed, but your M.I.N.D. becomes unstable whenever you go quiet... And your ears are turning red."}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "You've stayed connected this whole time?!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No! It was just a joke!', 3: '24', 4: 'Are you shy, Lee?', 5: '25'}
{2: '【kuroname】', 3: 'Honestly, though. Your ears really are turning red.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Quit joking around!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I think there's just a glitch in my heat regulator. I'll troubleshoot it and fix it later.", 4: '1'}
